The game it's self is awesome. It is also challenging it's self. But one 
recommendation for the app developer or developers if possible to do an 
update to where not to much ad pop ups but also I don't know if you guys 
also know that the ad's are like as a separate app of its own. Reason for 
me t...Full ReviewThe game it's self is awesome. It is also challenging it's self. But one 
recommendation for the app developer or developers if possible to do an 
update to where not to much ad pop ups but also I don't know if you guys 
also know that the ad's are like as a separate app of its own. Reason for 
me to say that is because when I kill task for any and all apps that are 
open the ad's is it's own window and it also has the little x in the right 
corner of it to weather if you want to close it or keep it open and 
running. Just to let you guys know if you wasn't already aware of it.

Totally addictive. Its not just about matching numbers as they happen. You 
have to make moves to get the numbers where you can match them without 
filling up the board too fast. There's a kind of Rubbicks cube element to 
that for me. Enjoy!

We will have an interest till we get 2048..... We will also have greater 
than that.. Try to achieve greater numbers.... Do you all know this.....???

colour....üòÇüòÇüòÇ

Superb & addictive game. Been playing the 4x4 board for the past one week 
now trying to better my previous score. I like the fact you can undo & also 
save game to your cloud account. Presently passed... 2048, 4096, 8192.... 
32768 and now in 65536 with a total score of 1,430,236 Amazing!

Would have given the game 5 stars. But I have reached a score of over 1 200 000 only to have it reset to a mere 25 000. And this is not the first time my score gets reset. I see a few other users have the same issue. I hope the developer will offer a solution sooner.

GAME RESETS I love playing this game and seeing if I can beat my high score. However, the game has reset several times recently while I'm playing.  I will put my phone down to do something (quickly, while leaving the screen on) and when I pick it back up, my game will be gone. It seems to happen since all of th...Full ReviewI love playing this game and seeing if I can beat my high score. However, the game has reset several times recently while I'm playing.  I will put my phone down to do something (quickly, while leaving the screen on) and when I pick it back up, my game will be gone. It seems to happen since all of the ads have been put on.

Love it. So relaxing & gets your mind off other things.    Only bad part, I Can't Lay IT down. Just one more  game seems to turn in several more. Got a high score in the 55000 s with 2 2048s . Enjoy  it much.

Now it plays audio ads and resets your games by itself. It still has sensitivity issues, despite an "adjustment". 1 swipe sometimes gives 2-3 moves, with only 1 undo. Nice. Hit RESET by accident instead of UNDO on the GAME OVER splash screen, and it resets with NO verify. Fun after 2 weeks and a 7-digit score. Now it plays AUDIO ads to wake sleeping spou...Full ReviewIt still has sensitivity issues, despite an "adjustment". 1 swipe sometimes gives 2-3 moves, with only 1 undo. Nice. Hit RESET by accident instead of UNDO on the GAME OVER splash screen, and it resets with NO verify. Fun after 2 weeks and a 7-digit score. Now it plays AUDIO ads to wake sleeping spouses, plus more ads whenever it starts or receives focus. And today, it reset my current 800,000+ game BY ITSELF. I tried to give this a second chance; now it's even WORSE. Use tpcstld's ad-free and bug-free 2048.
